champinon-plancha.name: Grilled Mushroom
champinon-plancha.description: Fresh mushrooms grilled with garlic, parsley, and extra virgin olive oil.

foie-manzana.name: Foie with Caramelized Apple
foie-manzana.description: Duck foie gras with caramelized apple and Pedro Ximénez reduction.

pimientos-piquillo.name: Stuffed Piquillo Peppers
pimientos-piquillo.description: Piquillo peppers stuffed with shredded cod and Basque sauce.

tortilla-patatas.name: Spanish Omelette
tortilla-patatas.description: Traditional Spanish omelette with potatoes, onion, and eggs, juicy on the inside.
